title: Early Observations on Improving the Effectiveness of Post-Crisis Regulation
content: For release on delivery  1:00 p.m. EST  January 19, 2018      Early Observations on Improving the Effectiveness of Post-Crisis Regulation         Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chairman for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     American Bar Association Banking Law Committee Annual Meeting       The Ritz-Carlton      Washington, D.C.                   January 19, 2018
